data.expected_result: The arrow points at "Allow", like it does on Windows, on Windows the buttons are the other way around, so an exception should be created for Mac
data.short_description: When the allow access to microphone pop up comes, the arrow is pointing at Don't allow [Mac/Linux]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on Firefox - Go to user settings - Go to Voice & Video - Click "access to your microphone" under the input sensitivity bar - Observe where the arrow is pointing
